show_name: Cute High Earth Defense Club LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! (OAV)
other_title: Binan Kōkō Chikyū Bōei-bu Love! Love! Love! (Japanese)
opening_theme: "Eien Mirai LOVE YOU ALL" (永遠未来☆LOVE YOU ALL☆; Eternal Future Love You All) by Kazutomi Yamamoto, Kōtarō Nishiyama, Toshiki Masuda, Yuichiro Umehara, & Yusuke Shirai
ending_theme: "Kokoro to Kokoro de" (心と心で) by Kazutomi Yamamoto, Kōtarō Nishiyama, Toshiki Masuda, Yuichiro Umehara, & Yusuke Shira
